description: The x-amz-cf-pop HTTP request header specifies the CloudFront edge location that served the request. It's a combination of a three-letter IATA airport code and a two-letter code for the location.

response-directives.description: CloudFront edge location in Atlanta, GA (ATL56)
CloudFront edge location in Dallas/Fort Worth, TX (DFW50)
CloudFront edge location in Newark, NJ (EWR50)
CloudFront edge location in Los Angeles, CA (LAX50)
CloudFront edge location in Seattle, WA (SEA19)
CloudFront edge location in San Francisco, CA (SFO20)
